title: I am preparing for the banking exam but not clear. Can you guide me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, I am also preparing for the same but I not cleared any bank exam yet, but atleast I can help you in this if you google you get many answers for this so I do not go here for write anything because may be you will not believe because I am also preparing .just watch “ASHISH Arora sir “ video on YouTube. You will get all you answer there . Please just watch once, it helps you alot . All the best.
